"Man that was different," he tells you.

Standing up next to a fold of a blanet that rises above you like some sort of material wave you reply, "Yeah." You did enjoy it as weird as it was. But still there is the business of why you were shrunken. Matt hands you back your boxers and tee-shirt.

A few a few minutes, a call comes from downstairs annoucing the arrival of Scott. You look up at the living mountain who is your friend. Your hoping he will tell you something. Instead, Matt goes to his door. You hear and even feel, the rumbling of quick moving giant steps.

Scott enters. He is wearing a gray tank top and baggy denim pants. "So where is he?" asks an excited sounding Scott.

"On my bed." The huge form of Scott looms over you. You fall over backwards from just trying to look up at his face.

A hand many, many times your size descends from the sky and picks you up. In the warm palm of Scott's hand, he tells Matt, "Boy, I forgot how tiny he is. And so frail looking."

"Yeah, but its so cool Scott," says Matt.

Matt respondes, "I bet."

You look up at Matt, who looks down at you with a somewhat sheepish looking smirk. "When can I have next?"

"I'll give him back in two days, after school," replies Scott.

You hate as they talk about you, but not to you. Matt pets you on the head. Scott closes his fingers about you. When the fingers release you, you find yourself tumbling down the dark depths of Scott's denim pocket.

For a while you remain in the dark, hot, stale smelling pocket. Then comes relief. Your pulled out of the pocket. You look up at Scotts handsome face. His brownish and blond hair is combed up as is the fashion of many a teen. The giant hair has created, to you, an alien looking fortress on top of Scott's head. The side of his head is shaven.

Scott places you inside a drawer filled with old baseball cards, books and cds. In one corner Scott had placed on a paper napkin pieces of food and a thimble full of milk. "I have to go out, but be back later," Scott tells you.

You go over to the giant napkin and sit down. You just nibble at the food.

After a few hours Scott comes back. Without saying a word, he picks you up. He sits on the side of his bed, while he holds you in his hand. "Man, I can't get over how small you are." He then starts to stroke you with his finger. Then picks you up between two fingers and rubs you up and down the side of his huge face.
14522212212211.title: Home With Scott

145222122122112.content:
"Man Corey, its so strange. You remind of the mouse I once had. Just like Mr. Doodles; small and soft." At least he is calling you by your name. But you don't like the comparison to his pet mouse.

For a while Scott places you on his broad shoulders as he does some work on his computer. He then listens to his walkmen for a spell.

He then picks you up and tells you,"Have to go out. Hey, I'll take you with me. And I'll place you in my hair," he says rather excited by the prospect of carrying a tiny passenger. You find yourself lowered into this strange alien like fortress made up of twisted and gelled hair. You hang on to one of the stiff tree-like clumps of hair.

Soon you are outside. Its your world. Yet it also does not seem like your world. It is a world of giants. You sit on the warm scalp, that shakes beneath you. The sun reflects off the shiny surface of poles of living hair. You hear many loud voices. And the sounds of giant cars.

You smell the scent of a fast food joint, it gets stronger. Scott you figured has gone into one. Your right, for you hear him order some food.

Scott returns home and to his room. He places you on the floor. His huge SUV shoes are right infront of you. He sits down. He brakes off part of a Frech Fry and hands it to you. Even this small piece is too much to handle. You lose your balence and fall over backwards, with the warm oily fry falling on top of you. Scott laughs, "Sorry dude. You ok."

He then breaks off a smaller piece. He then pours a little bit of a Strawberry shake in his hand. With his other hand lifts you up and places you next to the pool of Strawberry. You don't want to drink out of his hand like a pet or his fondly remembered mouse of yesteryear. You cross your arms. "Come on Corey you like Strawberry." He dips a finger in it and brings the mighty tip of his finger with the dripping shake close to your mouth. You catch a few drops that fill both hands. And you drink the cool shake. This goes on for a few minutes.

Once that is over you spend time in the baggy pocket of his jeans, while Scott is downstairs with his family. Once in a while a finger comes in and pets you.

At the end of this strange day, Scott gets ready for bed. He strips down just to his gray boxer briefs. You always thought Scott had a great build and upper-chest from the sports he took part in: swimming and football. But now at your tiny size he looks like a God or what you expect a young God to look like. His huge chest makes him look older, and his boyish face makes him look younger. As he stands towering over you, you can't but help admire the bulge of his manhood.

Two giant fingers pick you up as Scott crawls into bed. "You can sleep with me," he tells you. Once halfway under the covers, Scott places you down on his chest between his impressive pecs.

As Scott falls off to sleep, you can hear the air rush into his lungs. His body lifts up and slowly down with each breath Scott takes. Not able to get right to sleep, you gently crawl in the darkness, over the expanse of Scotts chest. His pecs feel like small, smooth mounds. You crawl up one. You come upon a nipple. It is large and soft. You use it like a pillow. You feel rather safe on the muscular chest of Scott. You finally drift off to sleep.
145222122122112.title: A Day  With Scott  And On  His Mighty Body

choices: Scott takes you to soccer practice
Scott takes you to the gym
1452221221221121.content:
Scott slowly woke up the next morning, feeling a small, light figure laying on his chest. As he looked down, he spotted the tiny human character sleeping on his left pectoral. That's when he remembered you. You're still sound asleep when you suddenly feel the soft ground under you move like an earthquake. You begin to move your head when giant fingers lift you up and place you on a giant palm of a hand. You open your groggy eyes as you feel your ground shake and shift some more. You feel like you're in an airplane as things shift from left to right. For a moment it seems like you're in a roller coaster. Then, you feel your body rising up higher and higher... and higher...

You open your eyes and you're staring at a giant face! It's Scott! The giant is staring at you with a smile on his face.

"Rise and shine little Corey!" he says to you as you feel your body being carried somewhere. Obviously, you have no control over where you're going. You are completely in Scott's hands, literally.

Scott carries you to the bathroom. He takes a leak and actually, you need to go too. You pee a tiny stream as well, but your stream goes into the sink like a tiny drop.

Scott then lifts you up again and places you inside of the shower stall. As you look up, Scott's giant feet enter the shower as well, you look to either side and you see a giant foot to either side of you. You look up... straight UP... you see the legs coming from the feet, and the legs converging at the groin... And a set of balls and a cock hanging from the groin, right above you, for what seems like hundreds of feet above your head.

Scott reaches over and turns on the water. Within moments, water starts running from the shower head and hits Scott's big body. Water pours down Scott's large frame then comes down from him and lands on you!

Scott then reaches over and grabs a bottle with green liquid. He puts it on his head. Suddenly, white foam starts to flow down his massive body and lands on your head as well! It's shampoo! You close your eyes so that it doesn't get into them! The shampoo also gets into your hair at the same time!

Next, Scott takes a big green bar and holds it in his hand. Then, he starts rubbing the green bar over his skin, which causes more foam to flow from his huge body and fall on top of you. But, as more foam falls on your body, you take it with your hands and rub it over your tiny body as well. Large globs of foam fall from Scott's gigantic body after it's just water and more water that pours from Scott's body.

"All rinsed off, little body?" Scott says, as he looks down on you. "Nice and clean?"

Then Scott reaches over and shuts off the water. He squats down and carefully lifts you up with his hand before stepping out of the shower. Then, he sets you on the counter, where he hands you a tissue. You dry off using that while he uses his bath towel.

When Scott was all dried off, he gently took you in the palm of your hand and walked you over to his bedroom. There, he removed clothes from one of his action figures, which fit you. You wear a shirt and pants and shoes, which fit you fine. He put on his basketball jersey and shorts. You're totally in awe of Scott, who is so big and athletic compared to you. His muscles are bulging all over the place!

You sit on Scott's thigh as he sits on the couch, watching TV, as his mother makes breakfast. You're starving so you can't wait. After a few minutes, the doorbell rings and Scott gets up, leaving you on the couch.

"Hey Scott! How is Corey doing?" Matt says.

Both giant boys walk up to the couch to see you. You wave back to Matt.

"I'm going to visit my grandma with my dad for the next few days..." Matt tells Scott. "Do you mind hanging out with Corey for a few days and taking care of him?"

"No problem, dude! I don't mind it at all!" Scott replies. "Corey can stay as long as he wants!"

"Thanks, man! Bye Scott! Bye Corey!" Matt says, as he turns around and leaves again.

Scott sits down on the couch again, shaking you around. But he picks you up, looking you in the eyes. In a way he makes you happy. You almost like him more than Matt.

"I wish you could stay with me, Corey... I like you a lot... I wanna keep you, little guy..." Scott says.

You begin to fall in love with the big, hulking muscle guy...
1452221221221121.title: The Next Day With Scott

1452221222.content:
You decide not to climb the manly mountain. For fear of what Matt might do. Soon you slowly fall asleep.

You are being picked up! But not by Matt. It's Corey's 20 year old brother Mark. He puts you in his pocket of his pants as Matt still sleeps away.
1452221222.title: A New Friend

14522212221.content: Mark goes to his room and takes you out of his pocket. As you are being pulled out you notice a tent in his pants. He brings you up to his face and says, "as you can see I am quite horny, so you have two options. You can either please me on your own, or I make you. If i make you, it won't be pleasant for ya."
14522212221.title: Mark Is Horny
